entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 15.
